title: [February 2025] Are You Our Next Rising Star? :star2::trophy:
description:
Topline: Join in on this week long campaign and complete daily missions to rank on the daily and overall leaderboard! Creators can earn points by completing missions each day. The silver, gold, and platinum leaderboards will refresh daily at 12am PT. The overall leaderboard will be cumulative throughout the whole campaign period and feature all creators. The top 20 of the overall leaderboard at the end of the campaign period will win rewards and the top 1 will be our new rising star with a feature on the next campaign page!

Gameplay: Creators with 10k-30k Monthly Diamonds in L30

Leaderboard points:
- Go live 1 hour = 1000 points
- Complete 1 match = 1000 points
- Gain 1 new follower = 500 points
- 1 diamond = 1 point

Daily Missions:
Silver Leaderboard:
- Go live 2.5 hours = 2000 points
- Receive gifts from 13 gifters = 1000 points
- Set up 1 LIVE goal = 500 points

Gold Leaderboard:
- Go live 1.5 hours = 2000 points
- Complete 1 Match = 1000 points
- Set up 1 LIVE goal = 500 points

Platinum Leaderboard:
- Go live 2 hours = 2000 points
- Use Multi-guest 1 time = 1000 points
- Set up 1 LIVE goal = 500 points

Gameplay: Creators with 30k-80k Monthly Diamonds in L30

Leaderboard points:
- Go live 1 hour = 1000 points
- Complete 1 match = 1000 points
- 1 diamond = 1 point
- Receive 1 Heart me gift = 2 points

Daily Missions:
Silver Leaderboard:
- Go live 2.5 hours = 4000 points
- Complete 2 Match = 3000 points
- Receive comments from 35 viewers = 2000 points

Gold Leaderboard:
- Go live 2 hours = 4000 points
- Use multi-guest 1 time = 3000 points
- Receive gifts from 40 gifters = 2000 points

Platinum Leaderboard:
- Go live 3 hours = 4000 points
- Receive gifts from 25 gifters = 3000 points
- Receive comments from 350 viewers = 2000 points

- 1 diamond = 1 point
- Receive 1 Heart me gift = 2 points

Daily Missions:

- Go LIVE using multi-guest for 1.5 hours = 5000 points
- Receive gifts from 50 gifters = 3000 points
- Receive comments from 30 viewers = 3000 points

Gold Leaderboard:
- Win Match = 5000 points
- Receive gifts from 25 gifters = 3000 points
- Receive comments from 280 viewers = 3000 points

Platinum Leaderboard:
- Go live 3 hours = 5000 points
- Receive gifts from 60 gifters = 4000 points
- Receive comments from 380 viewers = 4000 points

Rewards:
Creators with 10k-30k Monthly Diamonds
- 1st place: 50,000 Diamonds
- 2nd place: 30,000 Diamonds
- 3rd place: 20,000 Diamonds
- 4th place: 10,000 Diamonds
- 5th-10th place: 5,000 Diamonds
- 11th-15th place: 2,500 Diamonds
- 16th-20th place: 1,500 Diamonds

Creators with 30k-80k Monthly Diamonds
- 1st place: 75,000 Diamonds
- 2nd place: 50,000 Diamonds
- 3rd place: 30,000 Diamonds
- 4th place: 15,000 Diamonds
- 5th-10th place: 7,500 Diamonds
- 11th-15th place: 5,000 Diamonds
- 16th-20th place: 2,500 Diamonds

- 16th-20th place: 5,000 Diamonds

title: [February 2025] Go LIVE and Spread the Love This Valentine's Day üíåüåπ‚ù§
description:
It's our favorite time of year! Spread the Love on LIVE is back and it's time for you to get involved. Join us for a Valentine's day celebration on LIVE and earn exclusive Valentine's day themed gifts from your community! That's not all... The more gifts you receive and missions you complete, the higher you rank on the leaderboard and have the opportunity to win exciting rewards üéÅüíù
Sign up starting Feb 8th üîó ‚Üí https://campaign-va.tiktokv.com/falcon/campaign/fusion_cosmic_runtime/pages/home/index.html?activityId=7467555763665144581&campaign_traffic_id=cptraffic010002sc1000000012095037188&enter_from=live_square_banner&api_env=&lang=en&isRTL=0&short_id=1536632579&__live_platform__=webcast&_pia_=1&from_feed=true&hide_nav_bar=1&hide_status_bar=1&bdhm_bid=tiktok_campaign_component_hybrid

üìå Important Campaign Details:
Dates: February 10th 2025 - February 16th 2025
How to win:
There will be 3 creator leaderboards based off of creator performance in the past 30 days ‚Äì Cupids üíò, Roses üåπ, and Hearts ‚ù§Ô∏è. You can find what leaderboard you will be eligible for on the in-app page.

In addition to the overall leaderboard points above, creators can complete multi-level missions throughout the campaign period. Depending on what leaderboard you are on, your multi-level missions could look different. See the in-app page for more details.

An example of what your multi-level missions could look like for extra points on the leaderboard!

Level one
Go LIVE for 30 minutes
Receive 4 Lover's glasses gifts
3k Points

Level two
Have 5 viewers join your creator's team
Receive 2 It's a match gifts
6k points

Level three
Receive gifts from 100 gifters
Receive 1 Cupid gifts
10k points

Rewards:
TikTok LIVE wants to show appreciation to our Creators and offer exclusive TikTok Swag for the top 3 winners of the Cupids üíò, Roses üåπ, and Hearts ‚ù§Ô∏è leaderboards! 4-10th place winners will receive diamond rewards üéâüíé

title: [February 2025] Creator Bowl!
description:
We‚Äôve got something exciting coming your way, and we want YOU to be part of it! üåü

We're kicking off a special 2 week TikTok LIVE campaign where creators like you can team up, compete, and score big rewards! Whether you're a fan of the game or just love the thrill of competition, this is your chance to shine, have fun, and earn amazing rewards.

üèà When: Week 1 (Feb 7-13) & Week 2 (Feb 14-20)
üèà Rewards: Top 3 creators* will earn swag bundles ‚Äì one for yourself and one for your favorite supporter! Top 20 creators* will earn Diamond rewards üíé

üèà Gameplay & Points:
Week 1: Go LIVE and earn more Creator's Team members
Week 2: Go LIVE and win Matches

1 Match Point = 1 Point
Diamond Received from Creator's Team = Gift Diamond *2 Points
1 Quarterback Frank Gift (500 coins) = 500 Points
1 Touchdown Party Gift (1999 coins) = 3000 Points
1 Field Goal Gift (4088 coins) = 8000 Points

üîó Participate HERE or go to: https://bit.ly/CreatorBowl! Don‚Äôt wait ‚Äî we need you on our team!

The Creator's Team pillow above will be in the swag bundle and we can‚Äôt wait to see you LIVE!

To be eligible, Creator must be a Creator who is directly managed by a creator manager within the TikTok LIVE Creator Program or agency that is part of the TikTok LIVE Creator Networks Program and has been officially onboarded as of February 1, 2025.
